jobRoles.description: Lead our user research initiatives and drive user-centered design across multiple projects.
jobRoles.responsibilities:
Lead and manage a team of user researchers
Develop and implement user research strategies

jobRoles.description: Design end-to-end service experiences that delight users and drive business value.
jobRoles.responsibilities:
Design comprehensive service experiences
Create service blueprints and process flows

jobRoles.description: Conduct user research to inform product and service design decisions.
jobRoles.responsibilities:
Plan and conduct user research studies
Analyze research data and synthesize insights
